mapper.sql: primaryId, id, partCode, partName, model, companyCode, tabTime, uploadTime, native_createDate, native_updateDate
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, tp.terminalCode, tp.STATUS relevanceStatus, (select ps.primaryId from u_parts_status ps where ps.areaCode = p.areaCode and ps.partCode = p.partCode and ps.terminalCode = tp.terminalCode order by ps.recordTime desc LIMIT 0,1) psId, (select recordTime from u_parts_status where primaryId = psId ) lastRecordTime, (select status from u_parts_status where primaryId = psId ) partsStatus FROM u_parts p, u_terminal_parts tp WHERE p.partCode = tp.partCode AND p.companyCode = tp.companyCode and p.areaCode = tp.areaCode and tp.terminalCode = #{terminalCode} and tp.companyCode = #{companyCode} and tp.areaCode = #{areaCode}
mapper.insert: insert into u_parts (primaryId, id, partCode, partName, model, companyCode, tabTime, uploadTime, native_createDate, native_updateDate) values (#{primaryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tabtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nativeCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nativeUpdatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update u_parts
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
partCode = #{partcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partName = #{partname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyCode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tabTime = #{tabtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uploadTime = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
native_createDate = #{nativeCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
native_updateDate = #{nativeUpdatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where primaryId = #{primaryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update u_parts
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
partCode = #{partcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partName = #{partname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyCode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tabTime = #{tabtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uploadTime = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
native_createDate = #{nativeCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
native_updateDate = #{nativeUpdatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where companyCode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and areaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update u_parts set id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, partCode = #{partcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partName = #{partname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyCode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tabTime = #{tabtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uploadTime = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, native_createDate = #{nativeCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, native_updateDate = #{nativeUpdatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where primaryId = #{primaryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
